documentTypes.title: Proof of income
documentTypes.description: Please include salary, benefits and any other income for everyone in your household

documentTypes.title: Proof of savings

documentTypes.title: Miscellaneous
documentTypes.description: This is for internal use only to upload documents

documentTypes.title: Proof of ID
documentTypes.description: A valid document that can be used to prove identity

documentTypes.title: Proof of tenancy
documentTypes.description: Photo of both sides of valid tenancy agreement for your home including signatures

documentTypes.title: Previous tenancy confirmation
documentTypes.description: If you have completed previous tenancy details on page 5 of the RTB1, please supply and tenancy agreements or relevant confirmation of tenancy.

documentTypes.title: Proof of nationality
documentTypes.description: A valid document that can be used to prove nationality. IMPORTANT: If you are an overseas national you also need to provide us with proof of your entitlement to reside in the UK, ie you must have indefinite leave to remain.

documentTypes.title: Proof of previous Right to Buy discount
documentTypes.description: If you have previously purchased a property under Right to Buy and completed Part D of the RTB1, please supply any relevant documentation.

documentTypes.title: Joint tenant opting out of the Right to Buy
documentTypes.description: Upload of completed document

documentTypes.title: Proof of marriage
documentTypes.description: A valid document that can be used to prove marriage. If you are a tenant applying with a family member to whom you are married please supply a copy of the marriage certificate. Photo of whole document must be readable.

documentTypes.title: Proof of address
documentTypes.description: A valid document to confirm residency

documentTypes.title: Confirmation to give up permissions
documentTypes.description: All sections must be completed in full and signed by all applicants. Photo of all pages of the booklet

documentTypes.title: Anti Money Laundering form
documentTypes.description: All sections and additional information must be provided and signed by all applicants, photo of all pages of the booklet

documentTypes.title: Proof of Address
documentTypes.description: Two valid documents to provide proof of address. It must inculde the name of the Parent who is applying clearly wittren on the document provided.

documentTypes.title: Proof of Child's Date of Birth
documentTypes.description: A valid document to provide proof of child's identity. Picture of child's full name and date of birth must be in the Evidence.

documentTypes.title: Proof of Child's Date of Birth
documentTypes.description: A valid document to provide arrival details of child in the UK. A picture of an E-ticket with the name of child clearly written with date of arrival must be shown.

documentTypes.title: Proof of Residency
documentTypes.description: A valid letter from the occupant of the property stating that the parent and the child are currently residing with them.
